member.name: T:Bolt.Dependencies.NCalc.EvaluateOptions
member.summary: Provides enumerated values to use to set evaluation options.

member.name: F:Bolt.Dependencies.NCalc.EvaluateOptions.None
member.summary: Specifies that no options are set.

member.name: F:Bolt.Dependencies.NCalc.EvaluateOptions.IgnoreCase
member.summary: Specifies case-insensitive matching.

member.name: F:Bolt.Dependencies.NCalc.EvaluateOptions.NoCache
member.summary: No-cache mode. Ingores any pre-compiled expression in the cache.

member.name: F:Bolt.Dependencies.NCalc.EvaluateOptions.IterateParameters
member.summary: Treats parameters as arrays and result a set of results.

member.name: F:Bolt.Dependencies.NCalc.EvaluateOptions.RoundAwayFromZero
member.summary: When using Round(), if a number is halfway between two others, it is rounded toward the nearest number that is away from zero.

member.name: F:Bolt.Dependencies.NCalc.Expression.OriginalExpression
member.summary: Textual representation of the expression to evaluate.

member.name: M:Bolt.Dependencies.NCalc.Expression.HasErrors
member.summary: Pre-compiles the expression in order to check syntax errors. If errors are detected, the Error property contains the message.
member.returns: True if the expression syntax is correct, otherwise false

member.name: M:Bolt.Dependencies.NCalc.Expression.CleanCache
member.summary: Removes unused entries from cached compiled expression.

member.name: T:Bolt.CreateStruct
member.summary: Creates a struct with its default initializer.

member.name: P:Bolt.CreateStruct.enter
member.summary: The entry point to create the struct. You can still get the return value without connecting this port.

member.name: P:Bolt.CreateStruct.exit
member.summary: The action to call once the struct has been created.

member.name: P:Bolt.CreateStruct.output
member.summary: The created struct.

member.summary: Triggered when any selector is entered.

member.summary: The selected value.

member.summary: Trigger to toggle the flow through the toggle.

member.summary: Triggered on entry if the flow is on.

member.name: P:Bolt.ToggleFlow.turnedOff
member.summary: Triggered when the flow gets turned off.

member.name: P:Bolt.ToggleFlow.isOn
member.summary: Whether the flow is currently on.

member.summary: Whether the toggle should start in the on state.

member.name: P:Bolt.ToggleValue.turnOn
member.summary: Trigger to turn on the toggle.

member.name: P:Bolt.ToggleValue.turnOff
member.summary: Trigger to turn off the toggle.

member.name: P:Bolt.ToggleValue.toggle
member.summary: Trigger to toggle the state of the toggle.

member.summary: The value to return if the toggle is on.

member.summary: The value to return if the toggle is off.

member.summary: Triggered when the flow gets turned on.

member.name: P:Bolt.ToggleValue.turnedOff
member.summary: Triggered when the flow gets turned off.

member.name: P:Bolt.ToggleValue.isOn
member.summary: Whether the flow is currently on.

member.summary: The value of the toggle selected depending on the state.

member.name: T:Bolt.Cooldown
member.summary: Runs a cooldown timer to throttle flow and outputs remaining measurements.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cooldown.enter
member.summary: The moment at which to try using the cooldown.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cooldown.reset
member.summary: Trigger to force reset the cooldown.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cooldown.duration
member.summary: The total duration of the cooldown.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cooldown.unscaledTime
member.summary: Whether to ignore the time scale.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cooldown.exitReady
member.summary: Called upon entry when the cooldown is ready.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cooldown.exitNotReady
member.summary: Called upon entry when the cooldown is not yet ready.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cooldown.tick
member.summary: Called each frame while the cooldown timer is active.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cooldown.becameReady
member.summary: Called when the cooldown timer reaches zero.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cooldown.remainingSeconds
member.summary: The number of seconds remaining until the cooldown is ready.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cooldown.remainingRatio
member.summary: The proportion of the duration remaining until the cooldown is ready (0-1).

member.summary: The entry point for the action.

member.name: P:Bolt.Once.reset
member.summary: Trigger to reset the once check.

member.name: P:Bolt.Once.once
member.summary: The action to execute the first time the unit is entered.

member.name: P:Bolt.Once.after
member.summary: The action to execute subsequently.

member.name: T:Bolt.Timer
member.summary: Runs a timer and outputs elapsed and remaining measurements.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.start
member.summary: The moment at which to start the timer. If the timer is already started, this will reset it. If the timer is paused, this will resume it.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.pause
member.summary: Trigger to pause the timer.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.resume
member.summary: Trigger to resume the timer.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.toggle
member.summary: Trigger to toggle the timer. If it is idle, it will start. If it is active, it will pause. If it is paused, it will resume.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.duration
member.summary: The total duration of the timer.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.unscaledTime
member.summary: Whether to ignore the time scale.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.started
member.summary: Called when the timer is started.co

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.tick
member.summary: Called each frame while the timer is active.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.completed
member.summary: Called when the timer completes.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.elapsedSeconds
member.summary: The number of seconds elapsed since the timer started.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.elapsedRatio
member.summary: The proportion of the duration that has elapsed (0-1).

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.remainingSeconds
member.summary: The number of seconds remaining until the timer is elapsed.

member.name: P:Bolt.Timer.remainingRatio
member.summary: The proportion of the duration remaining until the timer is elapsed (0-1).

member.summary: The entry point for the try-catch block.

member.name: P:Bolt.TryCatch.try
member.summary: The action to attempt.

member.name: P:Bolt.TryCatch.catch
member.summary: The action to execute if an exception is thrown.

member.name: P:Bolt.TryCatch.finally
member.summary: The action to execute afterwards, regardless of whether there was an exception.

member.name: P:Bolt.TryCatch.exception
member.summary: The exception that was thrown in the try block.

member.summary: Called by the Animator Component immediately before it updates its internal IK system. This callback can be used to set the positions of the IK goals and their respective weights.

member.summary: The index of the layer on which the IK solver is called.

member.name: T:Bolt.OnAnimatorMove
member.summary: Called at each frame after the state machines and the animations have been evaluated, but before On Animator IK. This callback can be used for processing animation movements for modifying root motion.

member.name: T:Bolt.Cache
member.summary: Caches the input so that all nodes connected to the output retrieve the value only once.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cache.enter
member.summary: The moment at which to cache the value. The output value will only get updated when this gets triggered.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cache.input
member.summary: The value to cache when the node is entered.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cache.output
member.summary: The cached value, as it was the last time this node was entered.

member.name: P:Bolt.Cache.exit
member.summary: The action to execute once the value has been cached.

member.summary: The cleared dictionary. Note that the input dictionary is modified directly and then returned.

member.name: P:Bolt.AddListItem.listInput
member.summary: The list.

member.name: P:Bolt.AddListItem.listOutput
member.summary: The list with the added element. Note that the input list is modified directly and then returned, except if it is an array, in which case a new array with the added element is returned instead.

member.summary: The item to add.

member.name: P:Bolt.AddListItem.exit
member.summary: The action to execute once the item has been added.

member.name: P:Bolt.ClearList.listInput
member.summary: The list.

member.name: P:Bolt.ClearList.listOutput
member.summary: The cleared list. Note that the input list is modified directly and then returned, except if it is an array, in which case a new empty array is returned instead.

member.name: P:Bolt.ClearList.exit
member.summary: The action to execute once the list has been cleared.

member.summary: Triggering the destination may fetch the source value.
